A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow.  I wanted to badly to like this movie\, but what a complete piece of junk.  It's all been said here before so I'll be brief and will not provide spoilers.  But the movie is a complete mess.  Plot holes everywhere.  Unsatisfying character arcs.  And horrible mistreatment of the classic characters.  An abomination.  If you are a true SW fan do not see this film.  Do not buy the Blu-ray.  Save your hard earned $$ and go watch Rouge One or Force Awakens again instead.  In my mind\, the saga ends with Force Awakens.
